StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNumberOfContractsForRSorAbove]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngOrgID integer, @BeginDate date.me, @Contracts integer OUTPUT AS
SET ArithAbort ON SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT n.NWA_ID, n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INTO #Nwa FROM USMC.GetOrgHierarchyMinimal (@Recrui.ngOrgID) oh INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] n ON ( oh.ORG_ID = n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID AND oh.ORG_TYPE = 'RSS' ) INNER JOIN [dbo].[MICONTRACT] c ON (n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID AND c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
-- records created as a result of a Component Code change. SELECT DISTINCT n.NWA_ID INTO #NwaZkc FROM #Nwa N INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA N_OLD ON N_OLD.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N_OLD.NWA_ID = (SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM NWA N2 WHERE N2.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID AND N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT C_OLD ON C_OLD.NWA_ID = N_OLD.NWA_ID WHERE C_OLD.DISCHARGE_CODE = 'ZKC' AND N_OLD.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID
-- Component Code is no longer excluded --DELETE FROM #Nwa WHERE NWA_ID IN (SELECT NWA_ID FROM #NwaZkc)
SELECT @Contracts = COUNT(NWA_ID) FROM #Nwa
DROP TABLe #NwaZkc DROP TABLe #Nwa
SET NOCOUNT OFF
